Value: (1) Drive cage, (1) backplane board, (1) x16 riser card, (1) x16 PCIe adapter card, (4) data cables, (4) hot-swap drive carriers, (4) lockable carriers, (1) I2C jumper cable, (1) PEM cable, and screws
Upgrade kit to enable NVM Express suport in select 2U rack chassis.  Allows support for up to four PCIe SSDs (NVMe) drives out of eight; all eight slots continue to support SAS/SATA drives
